Detailed Description

Used for storing the indexes of lanes connecting two nodes.

Member Function Documentation

void ConnectingLanesTable::addConnectingLane (  uint32  fromNodeID,
uint32  toNodeID,
uint32  fromLaneIndex
) 
 

Add another connecting lane to the ones stored for the connection from fromNode to toNode.

This does not remove any existing connecting lanes, and if the fromLaneIndex is already set as a connecting lane, the data is not changed.

const set<uint32> ConnectingLanesTable::getAddedItemIDs (  const ConnectingLanesTable &  connLanesTable  ) 
 

Returns:
The item IDs of connLanesTalble that are not present in this connecting lanes table.

uint32 ConnectingLanesTable::getConnectingLanes (  uint32  fromNodeID,
uint32  toNodeID
)  const
 

Returns:
Returns a bit field with the lanes of the from node that connects to the to node. Lowest bit is representing the left most lane. If no data about this connection exists, MAX_UINT32 is returned.

connLanesByFromAndToNode_t ConnectingLanesTable::getFirstConnectingLanes (   )  const
 

connLanesByFromAndToNode_t ConnectingLanesTable::getNextConnectingLanes (   )  const
 

void ConnectingLanesTable::insertConnectingLanes (  uint32  fromNodeID,
uint32  toNodeID,
uint32  fromLaneBitField
) 
 

Sets the whole bitfield for the connection between toNodeID and fromNodeID.

If this data already exists, it craches the application.

Parameters:
fromLaneBitField The bitfield with the lanes of the from node that connects to the to node. Lowest bit is representing the left most lane.

bool ConnectingLanesTable::laneConnects (  uint32  index,
uint32  laneBitField
)  [static]
 

Tells if a specific lane is set as connecting in a lane connection bit field.

Parameters:
index The index of the lane to check.
laneBitField The bit field to check in.
Returns:
Returns true if the bit corresponding to index is set to 1, otherwise false. Always retruns false if the laneBitField is MAX_UINT32.

Assignment operator.

bool ConnectingLanesTable::removeConnectingLanes (  uint32  fromNodeID,
uint32  toNodeID
) 
 

Remove the connecting lane info for between fromNodeID och toNodeID.

Returns:
True if anything was remvoed, false otherwise.

void ConnectingLanesTable::reorderConnectingLanes (  const OldGenericMap &  theMap,
const set< uint32 > &  itemIDs
) 
 

Reorders connecting lanes and switches order of the lane data of nodes indicating that the direction of the connection is in negative direction compared to the direction of the SSI.

void ConnectingLanesTable::save (  DataBuffer &  dataBuffer  )  const
 

uint32 ConnectingLanesTable::size (   )  const
 

Returns:
Returns the number of connecting lanes elements stored in this table.
